Got Any Games? A Funny Talk on Gaming Nostalgia, History and Dev Life - Jack Simms - ACCU 2025 Short Talks
---

"Got Any Games?" is a lightning talk by Jack Simms from ACCU 2025—an honest, humorous journey through a life spent gaming, with a nostalgic lens on the PS2, Xbox 360, flash games, and everything in between. This funny gaming talk blends comedy, personal stories, and lighthearted tech culture, all while reflecting on gaming history and what today’s game devs and developers can take from it.

Jack explores the evolution of games from childhood classics like Viva Piñata and Call of Duty 4, to flash games on odd websites, to indie and AAA titles on modern consoles. He dives into the lost era of mid-tier games, microtransactions in games, and the existential question facing many nostalgic gamers: Where have all the games gone?

This is not just a game history recap—it's a fun, comedy-style retrospective perfect for software devel
title: Got Any Games? Gaming Nostalgia, History & Dev Life - Jack Simms
